name: Spacewolf
description:
Spacewolf is a free arcade space shooter game for Android phones. Aliens have invaded Milky Way and it's your job to defend it. Fight your way through space and see if you can find out where are they coming from...

Features:
- Story mode with 10 levels and boss fights
- Challenges and survival mode
- Technology tree with 15 techs to research
- 5 spaceships and a space station to build with multiple upgrades
- Artifacts to collect to complete the collection
- 20 achievements
- Leaderboard
- Device tilt or touch screen control mode
- Original Soundtrack
